collect.got-points: You didn't find any exciting item this time, but still managed to **earn %{points} event points**!
collect.lost-points: It seems like you didn't come accross any collectible item on your way, and you somehow **lost %{points} event points**...
collect.nothing: You didn't find anything interesting on your way, let's hope you'll have more luck next time!

got-items.one: You found **one %{item}** on your trip! (%{points} event points)
got-items.many: You found **%{count} items** on your trip! (%{points} event points)

collect.too-quick: It's still too early! You will only be able to collect event points in %{time}!
collect.strike-bonus: You got **%{bonus} bonus points** for using this command %{level} times in a row!

collection-empty: Your collection is empty, go collect some items!
nothing-desc: There are currently no events. Follow the bot news to know the date of the next one!
nothing-prices: There is nothing to gain for this event :confused:
no-objectives:
This event has no points objective, no need for a farm for once!
See the command %{cmd} for more information.
soon: An event is coming soon! Watch for information as it will begin on %{date}
xp-howto: You can earn event points by winning tic-tac-toe games, using event commands when available, or by performing various other secret tasks. Don't hesitate to come to the support server to ask for information!
